required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of X0002 Following Escalating Single and Multiple Doses Administered as Topical Application in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock:
Primary Objectives:
To evaluate the safety and tolerability of escalating single and multiple doses of X0002 administered as a topical application.
Secondary Objectives:
To characterize the single and and multiple pharmacokinetics of escalating doses of X0002 and its active metabolite ibuprofen as a topical application.

primary_outcome.description: Adverse Event; Vital Signs; Physical Examination; Laboratory Examination; Electrocardiograph; Skin Irritation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Single Dose Arms:0-120hours;Multiple Doses Arms:0-120hours post-dose;11th day pre-dose;12th day 0-120 hours post-dose.

other_outcome.time_frame: Single Dose Arms:0-120hours;Multiple Doses Arms:0-120hours post-dose;11th day pre-dose;12th day 0-120 hours post-dose.

arm_group.description: 8 Subjects,Single Dose once and Multiple Doses 7 Days,b.i.d,12 Hours Apart,Double-Blind.
